cards.Name: Guard
cards.Description: Name a non-Guard card and choose another player. If that player has that card, he or she is out of the round.
Actions: If player has named card, player out of round

cards.Name: Baron
cards.Description:
You and another player secretly
compare hands. The player with 
the lower value is out of the round.
Actions: The lower value is out of the round.

cards.Name: Handmaid
cards.Description:
Until your next turn, ignore all
effects from other players' cards

cards.Name: Prince
cards.Description:
Choose any player (including
yourself) to discard his or her
hand and draw a new card.
Actions: Target player discards hand and draws a new card

cards.Name: King
cards.Description:
Trade hands with another
player of your choice.
Actions: Player and target player swap hands.

cards.Name: Countess
cards.Description:
If you have this card and the
King or Prince in your hand,
you must discard this card.

cards.Name: Princess
cards.Description:
If you discard this card,
you are out of the round.
